p: The LCP also contains small amounts of triterpenoid (7) that had identical monoisotopic mass 454.3438 Da, formula C30H46O3, and diagnostic ion with m/z 437.34 ( Table 1). This compound was found in the leaf extracts of E. loxophleba and E. globulus along with dehydroursolic acid lactone and identified as 3β-hydroxyursa-9(11), 12-dien-28-oic acid (trivial name is loxanic acid) ( Sidana et al., 2012; Brezáni et al., 2018).
